column2: an A.M. Eatery////Great place for brunch
column3: the food is good but the service is terrible
column4: our eggs weren't even cooked to order. We didn't understand how service could be so terrible if this was a Wednesday morning. We spoke to the manager and he offered to give us something free but we didn't want anything from them
column5: just so they could improve there staff because the atmosphere is great and the food is also.
